name: Jalapeno Fries
author: lazybonez
summary: Delicious fried battered jalapenos that are awesome dipped in ranch or blue cheese dressing.
ingredients: 2 cups vegetable oil, or as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
6  jalapeno peppers - halved, seeded, and sliced into fry-shaped pieces
directions: Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan over medium heat
Mix flour, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper together in a shallow bowl
Beat eggs in a separate bowl
Dip jalapeno slices in beaten eggs, then coat generously with flour mixture
Fry coated jalapeno slices in the hot oil, working in batches, until peppers are golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes per side
